00019 /**
00020  * A simple logger.
00021  * 
00022  * This simple logger implements the Log Interface and is the default logger for
00023  * all ApnsPHP_Abstract based class.
00024  * 
00025  * This simple logger outputs The Message to standard output prefixed with date,
00026  * service name (ApplePushNotificationService) and Process ID (PID).
00027  * 
00028  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Log
00029  */ 
00030 class ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded implements ApnsPHP_Log_Interface
00031 {
00032     /**
00033      * Logs a message.
00034      *
00035      * @param  $sMessage @type string The message.
00036      */
00037     public function log($sMessage)
00038     {
00039         printf("%s ApplePushNotificationService[%d]: %s\n",
00040             date('r'), getmypid(), trim($sMessage)
00041         );
00042     }
00043 }
